Comments: I rated this a 5 because I'm hoping the promise of getting my bonus points back actually happens.  I should be rating this after everything is cleared, not prior. . I would love to email someone a screenshot I took to be sure Scholastic returns my missing 3916 points.
I also think my teacher order is still not complete.  I was more concerned with the parent order.  The person was prompt with a solution which I appreciate.  Thank you.
The way you handle tax exemption is very cumbersome. You will get more sales if you make it possible for those with tax exemption status to be exempt from the very beginning of the order process.

The replacement books may well be on the way, so my concern may be in the process of getting resolved.  I won't know for sure if it has been resolved until I receive the books. All of the communication that I have received from Scholastic has been polite and helpful, but the follow-through left something to be desired.  Each time I was assured that a new order was placed and my books were on the way, but either the wrong books were sent or nothing arrived.
MY OCTOBER BOOK ORDER NEVER ARRIVED. HAVE NOT RECEIVED ANY UPDATES AT ALL. FURSTRATING
I am happy with the outcome of my experience it did take four different times to finally get my situation resolved.
An order sent by mail was never received and a family is out $45.  I was told that there is nothing to be done.
Perhaps to have been able to explain how the duplicate order occurred. I am the only one at our school who orders through Scholastics and I am positive I  did not order but one time.
I quit ordering from Scholastic because it takes o long for the orders to arrive
I appreciate the timely handling of the original email and then the quick response to my follow-up question.
The live chat was very helpful.  It helped me find my student order. As a teacher, it would be helpful if there was an easier way to order books with bonus points before checking out.
I was not able to order the quantity I needed and then wasn't able to order any more.

I would love for the first Thanksgiving information to be available again. I am so disappointed that the First Thanksgiving information was removed from your website. I have used it several years with my classes. The students have gained so much knowledge from the activities and videos. I wish it was still available.
Quick to respond.  Clear in their message.
You send me emails to this email account daily and the customer service representative could not find an account attached to this email. I don't understand that.
I received a very quick response and it was so helpful!

On the shipping slip I have been sent our book box is being sent to our old address 300 Eads Ave. WE are not at that location We are at 507 Connelly Street. My name is Now Rhonda Keys I gave them the name change also when I spoke to scholastic rep. over the phone. Im not sure what the issue is? I called to set up getting book order fliers. I gave them our new address which is( 507 Connelly Street, Paris Illinois, 61944)      I saw that you are sending me a book box but on the shipping  form you sent you have the old address of 300 Eads ave  that is not our current address.  I thought we had gotten everything straightend out. I hope they are not being shipped to the old address because  we are really looking forward to ordering books again

I placed one order and had two separate charges, one for 29.15 and the other for 23 and no one can seem to tell me why. When I respond with answers to questions it’s almost like I. Getting a completely new person and have to resend the same info. Problem has not been resolved.
It took a few minutes to figure out what to click on .
We purchased a sealed product that was missing the main activity book. School sold out of them and it wasn’t the schools fault they received a faulty product.
The representative that I chatted with was very helpful and kind.  She was very thorough.
The information was given, but I still have to make sure the order is returned after it ships. A cancel order button to the online order would be great.
I just want to be added to the mailing of flyers. I don't understand why I'm not getting flyers to pass out to my students and why I can't get added to the list to get the flyers?????
Somehow there are 2 scholastic accounts set up for me.  One has the name of Kris and the other says Ms. James.  The account I use is Ms. James.
I need help getting my online orders approved/ sent in.  I am not able to continue past the first action without the site freezing.  My school phone number is 425-408-5693

Order shipped on Oct 15, shipped on Oct 20 and still not received as of Nov 8. The rep was supposed to send a second tracking number for the order however I have not received it. Scholastic says the order shipped on Oct 20. USPS says the order is with a partner carrier and has not moved since Oct 22.   The rep told me to call back later in the week if the order is not delivered.
Communication was fine/professional but it’s frustrating to not be able to have funds refunded from online deposit after missing the book fair due to illness last week.

Kristin was able to answer my unrecognized charge card related questions immediately.  I appreciated that, because I had spoken with one of your representatives over the phone and did not get a resolution.  Even after sending that representative an email with proof of the unrecognized charges on my account.

The online access our teachers have unfortunately does not include a way for billing to get to the business office. I have had several followups with trying to get invoicing for past orders that my teachers have placed online.
There wasn't even anyone there. I waited for 3-5 min for norhing

Hello!  Our school district accounts are tax exempt; however we are required to contact billing each time we receive an invoice to make a billing correction.  Is there a way to correct this glitch?  Thank you!!!

I want to know how to fill out my next due date and paper letter to parents. It used to pop up right away, but I couldn’t find it anywhere. I didn’t have much time, but I thought my question could be answered quickly. I was told to just click on the logo and it would be answered, but that didn’t work.

I got my problem solved and the person who helped me was very helpful and kind.  However, it was a little hard to hear her because of background noise-sounded like a television on.  I could hear the commercials easier than the person I was speaking with.

The chat disconnected before I was done asking questions. It would have been nice if Scholastic had a way to be notified of missing packages via the tracking number. If you were notified, I would not have to spend my lunch minutes trying to find out why the package was sent to the post office and then disappeared. I am pleased to hear that the package is being replaced, but it will arrive well past Halloween and the books were Halloween Gifts.

I originally emailed in October that I was charged sales tax and shouldn't have been.  I was told that while the order said "estimated tax", I did have a tax exemption certificate on file and wouldn't be charged sales tax.  I was still charged the sales tax.  My experience would have been better if the sales tax had not been applied the first time I emailed about it.

I keep getting told that the Gruffalo book is only for Gold Apple Teachers, but it is still on my account when I go to check out. Also, I have placed a $42 order already this month,but did not get the apple bonus reward (whether it be the Gruffalo books, bookmarks, stickers, whatever). At the bottom of the apple newsletter, it says the apple bonus is valid from November 1-30 while supplies last. I placed my order for the month on November 2. I plan on making a second order this month, but it wll not be for a few weeks until I get paid again, and by then the apple bonus will be gone for sure.

I am not receiving my catalogs for my students.  I am almost at the point that I don't care about doing it.  My parents do not like to order online.  They are busy.  They like to look at the flier and let me order.  We haven't placed an order since covid because we were not really back to normal till this year. I had explained I had never got catalogs this year and I was told to do what I have done 3 previous times and that was to go to the website and order them.  I have also called in about this and was told they would send September and even October to me and I never got them.  My address is correct and everything.  Poor customer service since Covid for sure.
Prompt reply, quick action to resolve issue - thank you!
The lady who helped me was amazing and very. helpful! Thank you!

My son's teacher is having issues and I cannot purchase online. See below. Can you please fix this issue?  Thank you so much for your help.  Respectfully,  Julie Moerls  KATIE HODGES 	 3:52 PM (1 hour ago) 	 I've been in contact with Scholastic 3 times now trying to get this figured out! They have my account on hold, but can't tell me why. I don't have an outstanding balance. Sorry, I should've responded earlier letting you know that I'm working on it. I called again today with no luck, because I called too early (before 7am.) I'll try again this evening or tomorrow. As soon as it's fixed, I'll let you know!

For a company trying to win back customers, I feel that there was nothing done to solve my issue of amending an order placed on a weekend and I am unimpressed that Scholastic can't seem to do anything to help me amend my order.  I was told it was too far in the processing stage to change.  I feel that my order could have been amended considering it was placed on a Saturday, so I would assume that the processing of the order did not start until Monday, today, the closest business day.  I have been able to amend orders from other companies with no issues and feel that Scholastic could at least try to help customers with order issues, especially considering that this is my first order in a long time and it has just left me unimpressed and not wanting to continue business with Scholastic.
My issue was addressed very promptly and professionally
Have not heard back about order in September,  Jordan never got books
When I ordered 12 of the new Diary of a Wimpy Kids books (that were pre-ordered at my book fair), I only received 10.  I called and the additional 2 were sent to me.
Immediate response to my question!  Above and beyond service!  THANK YOU!
The customer service representative that I spoke with never got back to me after she said she was going to investigate.
The lady who waited on me was very caring and took care of my needs.

The paper that comes in the box of books that lists which children bought what books is not perforated any more.  The orders on the page are so close together it is hard to cut them apart.  I liked how it use to be where each Child's order was on a separate box we could tear apart.
I asked when my teacher order would ship and was told there was no estimated shipping date,
Thanks for your efforts - I'm not sure how this parent got the wrong code for my classroom - what a mess. Confusion with the parent's order - still may not be resolved.
Please send me catalogs for 6th graders...I have 30 students...thank you I would like paper book order forms sent to my school.

Please close the OLD account and only allow orders thru the current one. I don't know.  Somehow, my account from 20 years ago, was triggered when an order was placed for my current school. Still waiting for the Info to be transferred to my existing account.  Just a frustrating side bit. Im hopng for a resolution soon.
The man I spoke with was beyond helpful and awesome!
More detailed explanation of the charges and accounting so I don't have to figure it out myself.

I am still trying to find my student order in Scholastic Book Club.  I did receive an email back from Customer Support with very explicit directions; however, the directions have been followed to the letter and I still see no items in the cart on my end.  I will have to find time to call.
Very prompt service this year -so far.
Problem was with UPS delivery and not Scholastic
Customer service representative clarified issues surrounding free book coupon/code with online purchase of $25 or more and we were able to complete the transaction to our satisfaction.
Will do!  I have been impressed so far.
I used the email option and response was quick and solved my problem.

I am not a customer. Iwas just writing to tell your company that one of your customers moved out of their apartment over a year ago, but I have been receiving reader pamphlets for them from your company. I just wanted to bring your account up to date.
An items  wasn’t delivered. Now my student has to wait another 7-10 days. It should be sent sooner.
Add more journals and diaries under $10. I would like more journal and diary options. I've always had several to choose from to spend my $10 free book choice money.

I had an issue with not getting notifications when a student placed an order. The representative suggested making certain my email was updated. It would have been helpful and saved time if specific directions were given in where to locate my personal information in Settings or to let me know what email Scholastic has on file. Thank you for your quick response! I was happy to solve the book order issue, quickly.

I emailed about a student order (placed on 9/27) that had not been received. They emailed back saying an order was delivered on 9/30 and that they would reorder it for me. That was a completely different student order. I have no idea of knowing what they reordered or how to track my students orders as a teacher.

See my email sent 11/4 or 11/5 regarding missing puzzle piece "6+1" in product "Simple Addition and Subtraction". i have received no response to my inquiry, except this survey.  You may email this address or call me--(509) 526-0888--to tell me what to do to get the missing piece. Your assistance without requiring more of me in surveys will be very appreciated in love for love's sake.  beryl ann.
Your company was very fast to get ahold of me
straight to the point, i like tthat
I was extremely pleased with what scholastic was able to do for me. I was provided with a quick response and felt taken care of. Thanks again from one satisfied customer.
I had a book that came that was falling apart and they were very quick to send me a new one.
Maybe let teachers know in advance somewhere on the website how to spend the teacher extra rewards in simple terms.
no idea. i just don't see why everybody gets a trophy for doing exactly what they're supposed to. the people i dealt with were helpful and prompt.

Scholastic is always easy and helpful.  I've been ordering books for over 20 years. I LOVE Scholastic books.  The problem is not Scholastic, it was my issue.  I did not realize that my books were delivered, and a substitute teacher passed out a bunch of them to random kids.  We ordered  again before this realization.  Scholastic allowed me to keep the missing books, and mail back the duplicates.  I am just waiting on an email with a postage paid address to mail back the extra books.  Again, I am not disappointed in Scholastic.  You guys ROCK! It was a great experience,  and my questions were answered.  Duplicate books are ready to be sent back, I am still waiting on the postage paid mailer to come in my email.  I  made contact one week later, and was told that it's turned over to a different department, and may be a few more days. Still waiting, but my box is taped up and ready to be sent back.
I was contacted within minutes of my email.  Within a couple of hours my concerns were addressed and a new order was being prepared for shipping.
She worked with her support people to help solve the problem.  However, I have not been sent an email with an updated invoice yet.  I can not submit the PO without the revised invoice.

If teachers want to order new catalogs for their class, please make sure to say they must be on the teacher shopping page & not in the parent section. For some reason, I was on the parent page and spent too much time scrolling through trying to find the teacher section. Well, that wasn’t going to be found if I was automatically sent to the parent view. Thank you

Very frustrating! I decided to try Schlastic again after a horrible experience last year with shipping. Once again shipping issues again. The representative said it wasn’t scholastics fault but the post office and the tracking can’t be found?! So I said when it’s not my fault or the students and the parents that ordered with you either! He said he would ship out another order! No idea I’d that was done! No tracking number nothing!! And of thr other box comes I need to ship it back….. NOBODY has time to do this along with the phone calls I’ve made!

I don't feel I should be charged for books that were listed as free on my first email stating how much I owe.  And then 3 days later the invoice email changed a higher price.  That is unacceptable and the representative did not even help to resolve the issue.  She just said that the last invoice was final.  Which is ot acceptable.  You don't go to the store but an item and then get charged more the item. So I will be contacting the better business bureau and the attorney General on this matter

I don't feel I should be charged for books that were listed as free on my first email stating how much I owe.  And then 3 days later the invoice email changed a higher price.  That is unacceptable and the representative did not even help to resolve the issue.  She just said that the last invoice was final.  Which is ot acceptable.  You don't go to the store but an item and then get charged more the item. So I will be contacting the better business bureau and the attorney General on this matter
write backorder on the books that are on backorder so we don't have to call
It is improving with each order - well done. Can you make the print on the invoice for each order larger?

The website seems to be having some issues lately so I reached out to customer service. Customer service was great, however I have never encountered so many issues with an online order before. Perhaps there are some kinks that need to be figured out. At first everything was showing out of stock and then once I was able to complete my order my free book was out of stock and cancelled from my order without the option to select another free book.
It's unfortunate you put out coupon codes that don't work for book club orders.
In the past shipment time is too long, I hope that is not the case this time.  Other then that satisfied with Scholastic

Getting an answer quickly was wonderful. The only improvement is really a process consideration. Having to pay taxes and then refund following delivery is odd to me. I would think since I have a tax exemption on file, it could be removed prior to purchase. Also, if we must wait until the following, can it be automatic? Making the customer remember to come back and ask for the tax to be taken off, and reimbursed after the fact makes things more complicated on the customer-side. I greatly appreciate the communication and response time, no issues there. Just was hoping for a different answer or a simpler answer.
I would like to see more $1.00 and $2.00 books so more students can purchase books.
